definition: a clever method of doing something, especially something new and different, become wrinkled or crumpled or creased
details:
noun
- a clever method of doing something, especially something new and different
= example: a clever method of doing something, especially something new and different
- a minor difficulty
= example: a minor difficulty
- a slight depression in the smoothness of a surface
= synonyms: line
verb
- become wrinkled or crumpled or creased
= example: become wrinkled or crumpled or creased
= synonyms: crease
- make wrinkled or creased
= synonyms: furrow
- make wrinkles or creases on a smooth surface
= example: make wrinkles or creases on a smooth surface
= synonyms: crisp
- gather or contract into wrinkles or folds
= synonyms: purse
